title: City under pressure
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Frank Spiller and Theodore Conant
brief_description: A case study of municipal government and the influence of citizens acting as a group. The study is of Edmonton, Canada, but the problems shown are common to many cities - urban renewal, traffic congestion, zoning etc. Listens in on discussion of these questions in Edmonton to provide ground for further discussion by the audience.
